price: Ang kabutihang-loob na iyon ay mula kay Allāh. Nakasapat si Allāh bilang Maalam.
arabic: ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡفَضۡلُ مِنَ ٱللَّهِۚ وَكَفَىٰ بِٱللَّهِ عَلِيمٗا

version.title: Filipino (Tagalog) Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tagalog by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: dhālika al-faḍlu mina al-lahi wakafā bil-lahi ʿalīman
